message:
SYSTEM: ATHENS_2010_-_Ontology_Languages.pdf: Página 51
ATHENS 2010 
© Raúl García Castro et al. 
OWL 2 (II). Three new profiles 
• 
OWL2 EL 
- 
Ontologies that define very large numbers of classes and/or properties  
- 
Ontology consistency, class expression subsumption, and instance checking can be 
decided in polynomial time  
• 
OWL2 QL 
- 
Sound and complete query answering is in LOGSPACE (more precisely, in AC0) with 
respect to the size of the data (assertions) 
- 
Provides many of the main features necessary to express conceptual models (UML 
class diagrams and ER diagrams)  
- 
It contains the intersection of RDFS and OWL 2 DL 
• 
OWL2 RL 
- 
Inspired by Description Logic Programs and pD* 
- 
Syntactic subset of OWL 2 which is amenable to implementation using rule-based 
technologies 
- 
Scalable reasoning without sacrificing too much expressive power 
- 
Designed for 
• 
OWL applications trading the full expressivity of the language for efficiency,  
• 
RDF(S) applications that need some added expressivity from OWL 2.  
51
speaker: SYSTEM
